Text: Sorry i havent cheked all files but getting tired now

How have I not listened to this guy before?  I love dancehall, Buju, etc but have never been turned on to this guy.   Excellent stuff.

Much respect to Rottis for puttin' this up.

Rottis I've obseved here that you have quite a collection of good Rare Reggae Music. Much Props to you my brother. I've been looking for a good old Roots Reggae Band known as The Gladiators, Do you have of Thier music? If you do Id greatly appreciate it if you shared it with me and the rest of our peers. THANX either Way.
Bless up my youth. Looking for some Tarrus Riley, I-Wayne, LMS, Morgan Heritage & more of the conscious contemporary stuff. JAH bless ....... again
